title: Literary Argument - a literal or figurative gift

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the gift and its complex nature contribute to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how the gift and its complex nature contribute to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
